casebody.data:
HENRY BRETT, JR. v. SUSAN BRETT [No. 51,

October Term, 1935.]

Decided January 15th, 1936.

The cause was argued before Bond, C. J., Urner, Offutt, Parke, Mitchell, Shehan, and Johnson, JJ.

J. Philip Roman and Walter C. Capper, for the appellant. William A. Gunter and Taylor Morrison, with whom was William A. Huster on the brief, for the appellee. Mitchell, J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court.
